desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ＆弱点属性ダメージをアップ＆攻撃力を３０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A simulator Noel found while developing the Frontier Gate. It is said that the beautiful semi-conductor found inside, which shines in different colored lights, has a lot of information regarding the history of Grand Gaia stored within. As soon as Noel took a glance at this data, he nodded to himself in approval while smiling, and promptly added a new function to the machine. It had now acquired the ability to penetrate the enemy's most vital points.

name: 幻導機・ジアクディール
